article_title: Can you place Tennessee on a map of North America? – The Denver Post
article_text:
Where is Tennessee on the map?

Click and drag the marker to where you think Tennessee is on this map of North America.

When you drop it, the answer will appear, and you’ll see how your guess compares with everyone else who has played.

On mobile? Play the map game here

Results: Here’s a map of where everyone guessed where Tennessee was.
